code: var Buffer=require('safe-buffer').Buffer;module.exports=function(thing,encoding,name){if(Buffer.isBuffer(thing)){return thing;}else if(typeof thing==='string'){return Buffer.from(thing,encoding);}else if(ArrayBuffer.isView(thing)){return Buffer.from(thing.buffer);}else{throw new TypeError(name+' must be a string, a Buffer, a typed array or a DataView');}};
